createTable.remarks: type of tenant: System, Test, Corporate, Individual

column.name: tenant_type_uid
column.remarks: type=pk;description=type of tenant

column.name: tenant_type_name
column.remarks: type=name;description=full friendly name of this tenant type

column.name: tenant_type_description
column.remarks: type=field,search;description=description of tenant type

column.name: row_instance
column.remarks: type=fk;description=FK to system instance

column.name: row_owner
column.remarks: FK to account_group - owner of this row

column.name: row_guid
column.remarks: global generated unique ID
column.defaultValueComputed: replace(concat('ttyp_v01_', substring(cast(now() as text), 1, 10), '_', substring(cast(uuid_generate_v4() as text), 1, 13)), '-', '_')

column.name: row_version
column.remarks: version of the row, increments with each update

column.name: is_active
column.remarks: 0 - row has been logically deleted, 1 - row is still active, 2 - row is locked to change, -1 - row is

column.name: created_date
column.remarks: date and time of insertion given row to database

column.name: created_by
column.remarks: account UID of person that created this row

column.name: last_updated_date
column.remarks: date and time of last change of this row

column.name: last_updated_by
column.remarks: account UID of person that updated this row

column.name: removed_date
column.remarks: date and time of change this row

column.name: removed_by
column.remarks: account UID of person that removed this row

createTable.remarks: single tenant - company that is using time tracker app, each tenant is independent and has separated accounts and clients; tenants are separated

column.name: tenant_uid
column.remarks: type=pk;description=Unique ID of tenant - code or name of tenant

column.name: tenant_name
column.remarks: type=name;description=full friendly name of this tenant

column.name: country_uid
column.remarks: type=fk;description=ISO2 country code - FK to country

column.name: tenant_code
column.remarks: type=search,field;description=tenant code - 3, 4 or 4 letters uppercase

column.name: tenant_description
column.remarks: full description of that tenant

column.name: start_date
column.remarks: start date of engagement of this tenant using application

column.name: account_uid
column.remarks: type=fk;description=main account representing tenant
